import React from 'react'; import styles from './Friends.module.css' import avatar from '../../assets/img/ava.jpg' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import Paginator from '../common/Paginator/Paginator'; const FriendsFunc = ({ totalUsersCount, pageSize, currentPage, onPageChanged, users, ...props }) => { return
{ users.map(u =>
{u.followed ? : }
{u.name}
u.location.country
u.location.city
) }
} export default FriendsFunc;
